name: symptom_search_tool
description: Search for Amazon products based on user symptoms. This tool helps users find relevant health and wellness products when they report symptoms or health concerns.

function.name: search_products_for_symptoms
function.description: Search for products on Amazon based on user symptoms

symptoms.description: The user's symptoms or health concerns (e.g., 'headache and fever', 'sore throat', 'back pain')

max_results.description: Maximum number of product results to return (default: 5, max: 10)

request.start: I'm searching for products that might help with your symptoms. Please wait a moment...
request.complete: I found some product recommendations based on your symptoms.
request.failed: I couldn't search for products right now. Please try again later.
request.delay: I'm still searching for products. This might take a few more seconds...
